comment: Incredibly good bourbon. Lots of caramel with an Irish flair to it. Not nearly as sharp as a lot of other bourbons. This is the zipps barrel
Nose of brown sugar and mild cherry fruit.  Taste leads into honey/brown sugar.  Mild spice on the front of the tongue and a hint of candied cherry on the finish.  Overall pretty smooth and mellow.
Gresham OR Store Barrel Pick; harsh, but nutty and cherry. Leather and barrel spice.
Strong nose on this bourbon. This is a 2019 pick by NKY bourbon group called “Gone in 60 Seconds”. Really oaky taste to it with a molasses smoky finish.

This is a WW&W (Louisville) store pick from 2018. 

Nose: vanilla, oak, dark fruit
Palate: butterscotch, oak, honey, just a little burn
Finish: orange, tea, smooth

Basically a more balanced and enhanced Buffalo Trace.  Excellent.
